ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Ah, you’ve arrived, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was starting to get bored!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m sure spending time with you will fill me with
thrilling inspiration!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I’ve held on to it thinking it would come in handy,
but I think you’d find a better use for it.
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I’m not sure if you’ll feel a jolt of anticipation, but
it’s definitely useful!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
If I come across another lucky find, I’ll bring it
to you!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Here’s a token
of my appreciation.
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I’ll be showing my support for you in more ways
than just providing gifts!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2103_03_10: Let’s continue to inspire each other!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Sure, let’s talk for a bit.
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’m up for a conversation about anything. Do you
want to talk, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I was waiting for you! Talking to you is always so
thrilling, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Hm? A present for me? Thanks—I’ll take it!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Wow, look at that! Are you sure you want me to
have it?
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2402_01_10: Why don’t we call it a day? Let’s talk again soon.
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Hahahah! I had a really fun time!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
My chats with you are always full of shocking
new discoveries!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I’m always coming up with thrilling ideas to
upgrade my machines!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8001_0701_02_10: There are a few machines in this room, too...
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
If you ask me, they all have room
for improvement!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
You’ve officially experienced the thrill of tinkering
with machines, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But this is just the beginning! Tinkering with
machines can be deep and complex!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I’ll teach you all of its charms, so I hope you look
forward to it!
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
It’s easy to get caught up in tinkering with
machines, always needing to adjust something...
I’m sure you understand.
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
It’s great if it leads to an improvement, but that’s
not often the case...
ch0115_00_denji_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
So, make sure you can revert any changes in
case anything goes wrong, OK?
